title: Is the NCERT sufficient for scoring 350+ in biology in the NEET 2020? Which theory books would you suggest other than the NCERT? - Quora
tags: Exam and Test Prep Book Recommendations
National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: In NEET exam in biology 95% questions are from NCERT, so it's better that you focus on NCERT and be thorough with it instead of referring to other books.
